A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a fan of Sci-Fi this was a fine movie. It was visually stunning\, and wasn't too slow even for a 2.5 hour movie. The only part I would cut is the nearly 30 minutes spent on Canto Bight (Casino planet). It's ridiculous at best and is an utterly useless section of the story.\n\nAs a Star-Wars movie this was absolute trash. It's in the bottom 2 or 3 for me including the prequels. Any rules set in place by the other movies are thrown out\, characters make stunningly dumb decisions simply to further the plot. Characters purposefully mislead each other\, but only so the audience can be tricked. Rey is the biggest Mary Sue I've seen recently\, and some of the social commentary is laughable.
